upgrading drupal to 4.6

07 Nov 2005 sick of trying to find a working photo-album module in 4.5, I'm now trying 4.6.
Since Debian doesn't yet have packages for it, I'm screwed and I have to install from source :(
Did I have trouble upgrading ? You'd better believe it!
I can't get the smileys to work :(
